title: President Trump announces new exemptions to tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced new exemptions to tariffs signing as new executive order this week. Trump insists this will help lower grocery prices for Americans.

title: Trump's approval rating at lowest of his term, poll shows
shortDescription: Just 38% of Americans approve of the job Trump is doing, a Reuters/Ipsos four-day poll released on Tuesday, Nov. 18, found.

title: Gov.-elect Mikie Sherrill will resign her seat in Congress on Nov.20
shortDescription: New Jersey Gov.-elect Mikie Sherrill will resign her 11th Congressional District seat at 11:59 p.m. Nov. 20.

title: One House member voted against releasing Epstein files. Here's who.
shortDescription: Rep. Clay Higgins of Louisiana was the lone House Republican to vote against the Epstein Files Transparency Act.

title: Sole 'no' in House Epstein vote was Clay Higgins
shortDescription: Rep. Clay Higgins (R-LA) was the only vote against the Epstein Files Transparency Act.

title: 5 reasons why Epstein files may not come out even if bill passes
shortDescription: Will all the materials in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation see the light of day if Congress orders its release? There's reason for doubt.

title: Trump's 2nd term at a crossroads with Epstein saga, affordability woes
shortDescription: Rare GOP defiance prompted Trump to change his position on the Epstein files. Anxieties about rising prices also led him to roll back some tariffs.

title: Trump calls to revoke ABC's license after Epstein question
shortDescription: Trump called for ABC's license to be revoked as he snapped at a reporter who asked why he doesn't order the release of the Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: Report: Trump official intervened in Andrew Tate investigation
shortDescription: An investigation from ProPublica claims a Trump administration official asked investigators to return electronics belonging to influencer Andrew Tate

title: Trump hosts Saudi crown prince at White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and the Saudi crown prince meet to discuss major investment plans and defense cooperation during bilateral talks.

title: Trump snaps at ABC reporter over Epstein question
shortDescription: President Donald Trump snapped at an ABC News reporter when asked why he doesn't immediately order the release of the Epstein files.

title: Did Donald Trump work at McDonald's? He references viral campaign stop
shortDescription: Trump spoke at McDonald's Impact Summit Nov. 17, 2025. He said he was the first former fry cook to be president. Did he work at the fast-food company?

title: Who is 'Bubba?' Not Bill Clinton, Jeffrey Epstein's brother says
shortDescription: Jeffrey Epstein's brother sought to dispel rumors that the 'Bubba' mentioned in a now viral email is not former President Bill Clinton.

title: 'Things happen': Trump dismisses Jamal Khashoggi's murder
shortDescription: President Donald Trump claimed Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman "knew nothing about" journalist Jamal Khashoggi's murder.

title: Trump defends Saudi crown prince
shortDescription: President Donald Trump defended the Saudi crown prince over a question on the slain journalist Jamal Khashoggi.

title: Court blocks Texas from using new GOP-friendly maps in 2026 midterms
shortDescription: The decision comes after a push from President Trump to revise Texas voters' district maps spurred other states to pursue mid-decade redistricting.

title: Watch live as House votes on releasing Epstein files
shortDescription: Congress is voting on a bill that would compel the Department of Justice to release as much information as legally possible on Jeffery Epstein.

title: Trump to outsource more Education Department functions
shortDescription: The department has worked out agreements with other agencies to outsource many of its functions elsewhere.

title: Jeffrey Epstein survivors speak out ahead of vote
shortDescription: Survivors of Jeffrey Epstein's abuse spoke on Capitol Hill ahead of a Congressional vote to release the files.

title: 'Quiet piggy!' Watch Trump admonish reporter over Epstein question
shortDescription: Trump was holding a gaggle Nov. 14, 2025, on Air Force One when a reporter was asking him about Epstein. Did he tell a female reporter “quiet piggy?”

title: Survivors rally as Congress weighs the Epstein Files Transparency Act
shortDescription: Congress is expected to vote on the Epstein Files Transparency Act. See abuse survivors and lawmakers gather ahead of the vote.

title: Trump tells reporter 'quiet, piggy'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump lashes out at reporter as Epstein emails spark tense exchange during press gaggle.
